title: SMARTMOVE - Vivatech Hackathon
phrase: Award winning solution at Vivatech's hackathon
description:
SMARTMOVE is an application and a Dashboard aiming to show all the alternatives to car ownership. The goal: to decongest cities, and reduce one's carbon footprint, by exploiting all the resources of one's city for mobility üõ¥üå±.

 We won with L√©a Buend√© the FREE NOW Challenge during the #Hackathon with our project SmartMOVE. This was made possible thanks to our pitch and a Q&A session that I had the chance to lead üöÄ. In one week we came up with the idea to create an ecosystem that allows users to learn about the impact and costs of a personal car and then redirect them to alternative modes of transportation based on their lifestyle and carbon emissions üåç.

articles.quote: the most mature project [...]. L√©a Buend√© and Duc-Thomas Nguyen demonstrated the unavoidable advantages of switching from car ownership to shared mobility.
articles.title: Smart Move wins the FREENOW challenge
articles.author: Pierre Cossard

articles.quote: We also calculate the carbon footprint of each option, so that our users can responsibly choose the most sustainable way of getting around. We want to change the situation and make mobility truly accessible to all, declares L√©a Buend√©.
articles.title: Car ownership in the city: for or against? An application, winner of the FREENOW challenge, demonstrates the advantages of switching to shared mobility
articles.author: AM-TODAY

articles.quote: Using public APIs and personal data provided by our users, we want to show all the possible mobility options to suit each user's lifestyle - other than owning a car, adds Duc-Thomas Nguyen.
articles.title: Car ownership in the city: for or against? An application, winner of the FREENOW challenge, demonstrates the advantages of switching to shared mobility
articles.author: AM-TODAY

articles.quote: L√©a Buend√© [...]. In collaboration with Duc-Thomas Nguyen, the SmartMOVE project aimed to offer a responsible, intelligent and accessible mobility solution.
articles.title: Efrei closes 2022 school year at Grand Rex
articles.author: ETUDESTECH

title: Greenmile - Google Cloud Hackathon
phrase: 3 Days to develop a solution using cloud to fight against global warming
description: Working as a group of six, we had a deadline of three days to devise a creative plan utilizing Cloud technology to combat the issue of climate change. During our project, we received guidance from consultants at both Thales and Google, while stationed at Google's Parisian headquarters for two days. Ultimately, we produced Greenmile, a mobile application designed to monitor an individual's daily carbon footprint using preexisting data collected by Google, in addition to manually input information.

title: Rails Active Storage
phrase: Project to get you started with Active Storage and its services
description: Once I had a project related to Rails and its Active Storage that I had to link to AWS S3 Storage. So I did a small Rails project using Active Storage and the AWS S3 Storage service. It's a content manager like Google Drive (without the design). You can add, modify and delete content. The project is available on my GitHub with the necessary documentation.

title: MACKEE TRADING APP DESIGN
description: Mackee was co-founded by a group of 5 students of which I was part as Lead Designer. It is a mobile application to learn trading and all its subtleties in a fun way. Mackee isn't available on app stores and some of the mockups are only on my portfolio.

title: SlackBot Greeter
phrase: Project to get you started with the Slack API using the Bolt-js framework. It greets users utilizing different methods from the API.
description: Basic "TEMPLATE" project to learn to create a Slack Bot from A to Z using the Slack API, the Bolt.js framework and Node.js. This includes documentation for setting up your Bot on Slack's website.

title: MACKEE HEALTH
phrase: Project to get you started with the Slack API using the Bolt-js framework. It greets users utilizing different methods from the API.
description: With the team at Mackee, we created a medical prescription generation and management app. Our market research revealed a lack of a unified solution for online prescription management among medical services, despite increased usage due to COVID-19. Our goal was to develop a secure tool that prevents prescription fraud while handling sensitive data. We came up with the Mackee Health App (iOS, Android, MacOS and Windows).

title: MACKEE'S GRAPHIC CHART
phrase: A complete graphic chart of our Mobile App Mackee.
description: Mackee was co-founded by a group of 5 students of which I was part as Lead Designer. It is a mobile application to learn trading and all its subtleties in a fun way. This graphic chart is one that I like the most.

title: MACKEE WEBSITE
phrase: Set of the website's mockups & the fully developed website
description: Mackee was co-founded by a group of 5 students of which I was part as Lead Designer. It is a mobile application to learn trading and all its subtleties in a fun way. Mackee's website is available at www.mackee.app. Some of the mockups are only on my portfolio.

title: Playwright Benchmark
phrase: Use playwright as a benchmark using browsers and speedometer
description: Using speedometer and playwright as a benchmark just for fun

title: MyServer. website
phrase: An awesome VPS provider to fit your needs!
description: This project is a Vue Application mimicking a VPS provider coded by L√©a Buend√© and Duc-Thomas Nguyen. The frameworks and libraries used for this project are the following. We used Vue 3 with Typescript, so make sure all your versions are up to date! Vue.js | Vue-router | Sass | Typescript

title: PLAYLISTS COVERS - VIBES SERIE
description: I had too many unstyled playlists on Spotify. I needed to do something to make it more appreciable. This is Vibes Serie.

title: SONS OF EFREI - EVENT POSTERS
description: The Sons of EFREI Motorcycle Club organization needed posters to promote a motorcycle initiation at EFREI Paris.

title: CANYON - APP CONCEPT
phrase: Canyon App Concept because they don't have a mobile app.
description: Being a huge fan of mountain bike and the owner of a Canyon bike, I had to do a concept app for the brand I love. This was the first time I used Sketch software.
